comment.author: 61479653@N03
comment._content:
one pane from where light reveals berth

springs long forgotten tension holding life

its shape now shown o'er time its strength my worth

this one cannot be fitted for a wife

a bowl to clean and refill a flask to quench

my legs and folds to neck and lips made damp

long stale the waters dank the room in stench

ignored like animal instinct by tramp

the barren walls are given to shock cold

and hands clasp change and flesh with fever

men take their needs inside as oversold

contrasting dark untouched by retriever

the sags let fall the taunt restraint

the light befalls a hope that's feint

comment._content: 'Sagging bed of a prostitute'-- dang. Best picture title ever.
